cast.name: 德拉戈什·布库尔 Dragos Bucur
维克托·雷本久克 Victor Rebengiuc
安迪·瓦斯卢亚努 Andi Vasluianu
拉卢卡·阿普罗杜 Raluca Aprodu
伊昂·萨普达鲁 Ion Sapdaru

writer.name: 拉卢卡·阿普罗杜 Raluca Aprodu

introduction: Dragos Bucur Calin Pip returns as the famous cop show The Good Guys! Freshly promoted to chief inspector, Calin resume fighting the mafia with Bogdan Dobrescu, Lori, Mary and Attorney Jacob. Target: Javel brothers dangerous clan, consisting of Sandu, the current head of the group, Nicu, former leader and Paris, a gangster.After a risky undercover operation, officers from the Organised Crime fail to capture Sandu. When Paris agrees to testify against the mob leader, the case seems almost completed.But when Lori, mate and Calin's ex-girlfriend is kidnapped and threatened with death, the fight becomes a race against time. In just 5:00, the police have to save Lori and carry out the investigation and!
